Package simbad.sim

Class Summary
ActuatorDevice An abstract actuator - base class for all actuators.
Agent This is the base class for all robot and is considered to be a heavy agent.
Arch An Arch object to put in the environement.
BallAgent  
BaseObject Base class for all objects added in the environment.
BlockWorldCompositeObject Base classt for all composite block world objects (arch...).
BlockWorldObject Base Object for all simple block world objects (box,wall.).
Box A box object which can be put in the environment.
CameraSensor This class represents a CameraSensor.
CherryAgent This simple agent can be used for 'pacman' expermiment.
DefaultKinematic This is the standard kinematic with two control parameters : translation and rotation.
Device A abstract device, base class for sensorDevice and ActuatorDevice.
DifferentialKinematic This class models the differential drive kinematic common.
EnvironmentDescription This class is intend to describe easily a the world and its components.
Eye  
Factory Not used yet
Geometry  
GripperActuator experimental.
KeyInputSensor  
KheperaRobot A KheperaRobot Agents.
KinematicModel This is the base class for all agent's kinematic.
LampActuator A lamp which can be turn on or off or blink.
LightSensor This class models a single light sensor.
Lock A Simple lock for mutual exclusion.
MouseOrbiter Manages changes of the view point view under the control of mouse movement.
PhysicalEngine Centralize resources and algorithms related to physical interactions.
PickSensor Base class for all sensors using picking.
Plan  
RangeSensorBelt This class models a circular belt of range sensors : Sonar , Bumpers (future : Laser, Ir).
Robot  
RobotFactory A helper class to aid building robot bodies and sensors.
SensorData  
SensorDevice An abstract sensor.
SensorMatrix A luminance Matrix : a 2d array of normalized luminances.
SimpleAgent This is the base class for all kinds of physical agents.
Simulator The Simulator class.
StaticObject Base Object for all block world objects (box,wall,arch ...).
Wall A wall which can be put in the environnement.
World Represents a 3d world - this class use intensively JAVA3D.
WorldFactory
